import PyTango
hostname = "$(hostname)" device = "$(device)" host, port = hostname.split(":") port = int(10000) edb = PyTango.Database(host, port)
sl = edb.get_server_list("EigerDectris/*") writer = None for ms in sl: devserv = edb.get_device_class_list(ms).value_string if device in devserv: dev = devserv[0::2] serv = devserv[1::2] for idx, ser in enumerate(serv): if ser == 'EigerFilewriter': writer = dev[idx] break wp = PyTango.DeviceProxy('%s/%s' % (hostname, writer)) filepattern = wp.FilenamePattern.split("/")[-1] imagesperfile = wp.ImagesPerFile if "$var.filename": path = ("$var.filename").split("/")[-1].split(".")[0] + "/" else: path = "" #path += '%s/%s_master.h5://entry' % ($(name), filepattern) path += '%s/%s_' % ("$(name)", filepattern) tmode = ds.$(name)_triggermode totnbimages = sum(commonblock["$(name)_stepindex"]) nbfiles = (totnbimages + imagesperfile - 1) // imagesperfile ds.result = tmode.lower() if "__root__" in commonblock.keys(): root = commonblock["__root__"] if root.h5object.__class__.__name__ == "nxgroup": import nxswriter.PNIWriter as nxw else: import nxswriter.H5PYWriter as nxw else: root = commonblock["__nxroot__"] import pni.io.nx.h5 as nxw en = root.open("$(__entryname__)$var.serialno") dt = en.open("data") ins = en.open("instrument") det = ins.open("$(name)") col = det.open("collection") for nbf in range(1, nbfiles+1): nxw.link("%sdata_%06i.h5://entry/data/data" % (path, nbf), col, "data_%06i" % nbf) nxw.link("/$(__entryname__)$var.serialno/instrument/$(name)/collection/data_%06i" % nbf, dt, "data_%06i" % nbf)
$datasources.$(name)_triggermode $datasources.$(name)_nbimages $datasources.$(name)_nbtriggers
